text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version 2021
    CodeDisplay
    461511000124101Biochemically recurrent prostate cancer (disorder)
    822970008Acinar cell cystadenocarcinoma of prostate (disorder)
    722103009Hormone sensitive prostate cancer (disorder)
    255149000Carcinoma in situ of prostatic ducts (disorder)
    93974005Primary malignant neoplasm of prostate (disorder)
    399068003Malignant tumor of prostate (disorder)
    369486003Malignant tumor involving prostate by separate metastasis from bladder (disorder)
    278060005Endometrioid carcinoma of prostate (disorder)
    396198006Small cell carcinoma of prostate (disorder)
    712849003Primary malignant neoplasm of prostate metastatic to bone (disorder)
    459381000124106Metastasis from hormone-refractory prostate cancer (disorder)
    1098981000119101Recurrent malignant neoplasm of prostate (disorder)
    449318001Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma of prostate (disorder)
    254900004Carcinoma of prostate (disorder)
    823017009Infiltrating duct carcinoma of prostate (disorder)
    92691004Carcinoma in situ of prostate (disorder)
    427492003Hormone refractory prostate cancer (disorder)
    399490008Adenocarcinoma of prostate (disorder)
    96901000119105Prostate cancer metastatic to eye (disorder)
    126906006Neoplasm of prostate (disorder)
    715412008Familial malignant neoplasm of prostate (disorder)
    448217003Follicular non-Hodgkin's lymphoma of prostate (disorder)
    448213004Diffuse non-Hodgkin's lymphoma of prostate (disorder)
    314969001Local recurrence of malignant tumor of prostate (disorder)
    369485004Malignant tumor involving prostate by direct extension from bladder (disorder)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm version 2022
    CodeDisplay
    D07.5Carcinoma in situ of prostate
    C61Malignant neoplasm of prostate

name: ProstateCancerCombined
title: Prostate Cancer Combined
description: This valueset contains the diagnosis codes for prostate cancer and diseases that are clinically treated as prostate cancer. It contains both ICD-10 and SNOMED.

concept.display: Carcinoma in situ of prostatic ducts (disorder)
Malignant tumor involving prostate by separate metastasis from bladder (disorder)

Local recurrence of malignant tumor of prostate (disorder)
Malignant tumor involving prostate by direct extension from bladder (disorder)
